body:
Dear nhentai.net,
   I saw [Sanbun Kyoden] Gekkakou no Ori Chapter 10 on http://book.dmm.co.jp/ . Please update new that chapter.
Refer: http://book.dmm.co.jp/detail/b479anoad00259/

I have not seen that at any hentai website, this is an opportunity to increase visitors for your website :)

Thanks you so much !

Thanks & Regards
FAN OF NHENTAI.NET
Can someone please tell me where I can learn Japanese?  I don't want to die, so I will have to learn how to read Japanese.  :-)
